questionTitle: Which of the following correctly represents different types of mobile patterns?
questionExplanation: You can define the features in software and hardware that enables flexibility as conforming to one or more of the mobility patterns.

questionOption1: Abstraction enables the key benefit of cloud computing: shared, ubiquitous access
questionOption2: Virtualization assigns a logical name for a physical resource and then provides a pointer to that physical resource when a request is made
questionOption3: All cloud computing applications combine their resources into pools that can be assigned on demand to users
questionExplanation: Several important cloud computing approaches use a strictly hardware-based approach to abstraction.

questionTitle: Which of the following type of virtualization is also characteristic of cloud computing?
questionExplanation: To enable these characteristics, resources must be highly configurable and flexible.

questionTitle: The technology used to distribute service requests to resources is referred to as _____________
questionExplanation: Load balancing is an optimization technique.

questionOption1: A client can request access to a cloud service from any location
questionOption2: A cloud has multiple application instances and directs requests to an instance based on conditions
questionOption3: Computers can be partitioned into a set of virtual machines with each machine being assigned a workload
questionExplanation: Alternatively, systems can be virtualized through load-balancing technologies.

questionTitle: Which of the following software can be used to implement load balancing?
questionExplanation: Load balancing can be used to increase utilization and throughput, lower latency, reduce response time, and avoid system overload.

questionTitle: Which of the following network resources can be load balanced?
questionExplanation: Load balancing provides the necessary redundancy to make an intrinsically unreliable system reliable through managed redirection.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a more sophisticated load balancer?
questionExplanation: They determine the current utilization of the resources in their pool.

questionTitle: A ______ is a combination load balancer and application server that is a server placed between a firewall or router.
questionExplanation: An Application Delivery Controller is assigned a virtual IP address (VIP) that maps to a pool of servers based on application specific criteria.
